title: 29. Overcoming Instagram Jealousy in the Aesthetics Industry, Why Gossip Is Bad For Business, Trolls Can Motivate You, How to Meet a Mentor + Skin Purge Vs. Breakout!
description:
Hi Roomies, this is a casual, Q+A based episode! I am covering:

- How to overcome jealousy within the aesthetics industry

- Why trolls should motivate you

- Why gossiping is bad for your business

- Why you can't compare yourself to what you see on instagram

- How to market your business authentically

- How to meet a mentor

- Managing your clients' expectation if they're going through a purge

You can shop my Glymed store here

Shop Mega-Purifying Cleanser

Association of Holistic Skincare Practitioners
